document_data.name: Shield House
document_data.mainbody: '''Shield House''' was a fortified compound in the hinterlands of [[Cormyr]], used by the [[Heralds of Faerûn]].
document_data.Location: The House lay in the [[East Reaches of Cormyr]] northeast of [[Castle Crag]] and the [[Gnoll Peaks]], just west of the joining of the [[Immerflow]]'s headwaters.
document_data.Inhabitants: In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the House was held by [[Naerlyn Phalphar]] of the Herald's [[Green Shield]] office.
